Description: Pottery jar; bulbous body(restored); flaring neck; blue painted lotus decoration.
Curator's comments: Published: James, A.S., BM Book of Flowers, (BM 1989), p.8, fig.2. Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt, Japan 1999-2000, [139]. Shaw and Nicholson, BM Dictionary of Ancient Egypt, p. 225.
Bibliographic references: Shaw & Nicholson 1995 / British Museum Dictionary of Ancient Egypt (p225)
